com.mousebird.maply

Class Point2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.Point2d

  • public class Point2d
extends java.lang.Object
    The Point2d class is the simple, dumb, 2D coordinate class. The only things of note is this is wrapping the internal Maply coordinate class and gets passed around a lot.

        public static Point2d FromDegrees(double lon,
                                  double lat)
        Create a Point2D geo coordinate from degrees.
        Parameters:
        lon - Longitude first in degrees.
        lat - Then latitude in degrees.
        Returns:
        A Point2d in radians.

      • toDegrees

        public Point2d toDegrees()
        Points are normally stored as radians, if they're positions on the globe or map. This converts and returns degrees.
